summary: Donald Trump claimed at the Trump UNGA on September 19th, 2017 that it is a massive source of embarrassment to the United Nations that some governments with egregious human rights records sit on the UN Human Rights Council.

Donald Trump claimed at the Trump UNGA on September 19th, 2017 that the United States pays 22 percent of the entire budget of the United Nations, despite being only one out of 193 countries in the organization.

Donald Trump, during the Trump UNGA event on September 19th, 2017, claimed that strong and independent nations embracing their sovereignty are crucial for promoting security, prosperity, and peace. He argued that diverse countries do not need to share the same cultures or systems of government, but they should uphold two core sovereign duties: respecting the interests of their own people and the rights of every other sovereign nation. Trump stated that this vision is the foundation for cooperation and success, allowing diverse countries to work together on the basis of mutual respect. He emphasized that strong, sovereign nations enable individuals to flourish and control their own destiny, without seeking to impose their way of life on others. Trump concluded by stating that America serves as an example for others to observe and take pride in.

Donald Trump claimed at the Trump UNGA on September 19th, 2017 that it is time for all nations to work together to isolate the Kim regime until it ceases its hostile behavior. He also stated that it is far past time for the nations of the world to confront the Iranian government, which he described as a corrupt dictatorship that exports violence, bloodshed, and chaos.
